title: The Scotch wedding: or, A short and pretty way of wooing. When as complexions do agree, and all things they are fitting; why should the time prolonged be, be quick and mind your knitting. To a new northern tune, much us'd at the theatres. With allowance.
author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, at the Golden-Ball, in West-smith field.,
